blackboard.birt.extensions.dotbar
Class DotbarItem

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.extension.ReportItem
      blackboard.birt.extensions.dotbar.DotbarItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.extension.ICompatibleReportItem, org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.extension.IReportItem
public class DotbarItem
extends org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.extension.ReportItem

Provides an interface allowing all control properties to be loaded from and saved to the report model.

Author:
Steve Schafer / Innovent Solutions
